education.institution: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.area: Computer Science, Concentration in Software Development

projects.name: Consults With Results -- Software Development Capstone
projects.summary: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Nodejs, MongoDB, Agile-Scrum
highlights: Created a meeting management application on a team with four other developers
Developed functions relating to how user accounts interact with the application, including profile pages front-end, user accounts back-end, and database entries for user accounts.
Communicated about the projectâ€™s progress with the development team of five members on a daily basis through scrum meetings and group messages, taking notes on what everyone has completed

projects.name: Ultimate Match Analyzer -- Computer Vision with Python
projects.summary: Python, Jupyter Notebook, YOLOv8, Image Recognition
highlights: Developed a program that uses an object-detection algorithm to gather data about what is happening in a fighting game match
Created 159 images to train an object-detection model that can distinguish between eight different characters based on a live game feed

projects.name: CarCare, Human-Centered Design
projects.summary: Figma, Heuristic Design Analysis, Usability Testing
highlights: Surveyed 30 potential users of an application meant to track car maintenance for how they would use the application and their needs
Built an interactive Figma prototype based on needfinding survey results
Conducted usability tests with six users by analyzing how users interacted with the prototype to complete tasks and asking users questions before and after completing tasks

work.name: Publix
highlights: Assist customers by answering questions, giving suggestions, and taking special orders
Maintain sales floor by finishing and packaging products
